TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlInputRadioButton extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class HtmlInputRadioButton Inherits HtmlInputControl Implements IPostBackDataHandler
type HtmlInputRadioButton = class inherit HtmlInputControl interface IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用 控件在网页上创建单选按钮。Use the control to create a radio button on a Web page. 控件不提供用于显示单选按钮标题的内置功能。The control does not provide built-in functionality to display a caption for the radio button. 若要创建标题，请在网页中所需的位置使用文字文本。To create a caption, use literal text in the Web page at the desired location. 这使您可以确定标题相对于单选按钮的显示位置。This allows you to determine where the caption is displayed relative to the radio button. 例如，如果想要在单选按钮右侧显示标题，请声明一个 控件，后跟标题文本，如下面的代码所示。For example, if you want to display the caption on the right side of the radio button, declare an control, followed by the caption text, as shown in the following code. ``` Caption Text
``` 可以选择将数量与 控件关联，方法是设置 "" 属性。You can optionally associate a quantity with the control by setting the property. 当你有多个单选按钮并且需要根据所选内容执行计算时，这非常有用。This is useful when you have multiple radio buttons and need to perform a calculation, based on the selection. 可以通过为每个要包括在组中的单选按钮的 属性指定一个公用值，将 控件组合在一起。 controls can be grouped together by specifying a common value for the property of each radio button you want to include in the group. > [!NOTE] > 将 控件组合在一起时，一次只能选择组中的一个单选按钮。When you group controls together, only one radio button in the group can be selected at a time. 若要确定 控件是否处于选中状态，请测试 属性。To determine whether the control is selected, test the property. 如果你有一组 控件，则必须循环访问控件并分别测试每个控件的 属性。If you have a group of controls, you must iterate through the controls and test the property of each control individually. 控件提供 事件，该事件在 属性更改向服务器的各次发送之间的值时引发。The control provides a event that is raised when the property changes values between posts to the server. 这允许您创建一个自定义事件处理程序，该处理程序在引发事件时执行一组特定的指令，如数据验证。This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs a specific set of instructions when the event is raised, such as data validation. 有关 实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件创建一组单选按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to create a group of radio buttons. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

Public Sub New ()
public: HtmlInputRadioButton();

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化 类的新实例。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"收音机" 文本字符串。The "radio" literal string.| ## Examples [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputRadioButtonCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButtonCtor/CS/htmlinputradiobuttonctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputRadioButtonCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButtonCtor/VB/htmlinputradiobuttonctorvb.aspx#1)]

member this.Checked : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否选择了 控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is selected.

value.span: 如果选择了 控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control is selected; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来确定是否选择 控件。Use the property to determine whether the control is selected. 如果你有一组 控件，则必须循环访问控件并分别测试每个控件的 属性。If you have a group of controls, you must iterate through the controls and test the property of each control individually. 你还可以使用此属性以编程方式指定是否选择了控件。You can also use this property to programmatically specify whether the control is selected. 您可以通过为每个要包括在组中的单选按钮控件的 属性指定一个公用值，将 控件组合在一起。You can group controls together by specifying a common value for the property of each radio button control you want to include in the group. > [!NOTE] > 组合 控件时，一次只能选择组中的一个单选按钮。When you group controls, only one radio button in the group can be selected at a time. 所选控件的 属性设置为 `true`，而相同的属性设置为组中所有其他单选按钮的 `false`。The property of the selected control is set to `true`, while the same property is set to `false` for all other radio buttons in the group. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性确定组中的哪个单选按钮处于选中状态。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine which radio button in the group is selected. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检查 控件的回发值是否不同于其以前的值，如果是，则返回 `true`。The method checks to see whether the postback value of the control is different from its previous value, and if so, returns `true`. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展 控件的功能。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

span.span: The group of check box controls that the instance of the class is a member of.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过为每个要包括在组中的单选按钮的 属性指定一个公用值，对多个 控件进行分组。Group multiple controls by specifying a common value for the property of each radio button you want to include in the group. 组合 控件时，一次只能选择组中的一个单选按钮。When you group controls, only one radio button in the group can be selected at a time. 所选控件的 属性设置为 `true`，而相同的属性设置为组中所有其他单选按钮的 `false`。The property of the selected control is set to `true`, while the same property is set to `false` for all other radio buttons in the group. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性对多个 控件进行分组。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to group multiple controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputRadioButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 引发 事件并将 控件注册为需要回发处理的控件。

span.span: Raises the event and registers the control as one that requires postback handling.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在呈现 控件之前，只需调用 方法。The method is called just prior to rendering the control. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展 控件的功能。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法，以便它在自定义 服务器控件中添加 `Title` 特性。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it adds a `Title` attribute in a custom server control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_onprerender.vb#2)]

span.span: A that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

summary.span: 这使您得以在该事件引发时创建自定义事件处理程序。

span.span: This allows you to create a custom event handler when the event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件的 属性在向服务器的各次发送之间更改值时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the property of the control changes values between posts to the server. 这允许您创建一个自定义事件处理程序，该处理程序在引发事件时执行一组特定的指令（如数据验证）。This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs a specific set of instructions (such as data validation) when the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须启用视图状态， 事件才能正常工作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 若要在 Web 窗体页上启用所有控件的视图状态，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To enable view state for all controls on the Web Forms page, set the property to `true`. 还可以通过将 属性设置为 `true`，为单个控件启用视图状态。You can also enable view state for an individual control by setting the property to `true`. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为 事件指定和编写处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 自定义事件处理程序更新网页上的标签以显示所选单选按钮的值。The custom event handler updates a label on the Web page to display the value of the selected radio button. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputRadioButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButton/CS/htmlinputradiobuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputRadioButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButton/VB/htmlinputradiobuttonvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange/CS/htmlinputradiobuttonserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange/VB/htmlinputradiobuttonserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 方法时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以便正确引发 事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the event is correctly raised.

summary.span: 将 控件特性呈现给指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the control attributes to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将 属性作为 控件的特性写入，然后调用基类的 方法。The method writes the property as an attribute of the control and then calls the base class's method 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展 控件的功能。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写自定义服务器控件中的 方法，以便始终为 显示特定标题文本。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that specific title text is always displayed for the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_renderattributescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_renderattributesvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_renderattributes.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputRadioButtonRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlinputradiobutton_renderattributes.vb#2)]

summary.span: 当 控件的 属性值在两次服务器发送间更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property of the control changes between posts to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件的 属性在向服务器的各次发送之间更改值时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the property of the control changes value between posts to the server. 这允许您创建一个自定义事件处理程序，该处理程序在引发事件时执行一组特定的指令（如数据验证）。This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs a specific set of instructions (such as data validation) when the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须启用视图状态， 事件才能正常工作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 若要在 Web 窗体页上启用所有控件的视图状态，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To enable view state for all controls on the Web Forms page, set the property to `true`. 还可以通过将 属性设置为 `true`，为单个控件启用视图状态。You can also enable view state for an individual control by setting the property to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为 事件指定和编写处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 自定义事件处理程序更新网页上的标签以显示所选单选按钮的值。The custom event handler updates a label on the Web page to display the value of the selected radio button. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputRadioButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButton/CS/htmlinputradiobuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputRadioButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButton/VB/htmlinputradiobuttonvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange/CS/htmlinputradiobuttonserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButtonServerChange/VB/htmlinputradiobuttonserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与 控件关联的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value associated with the control.
The value associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定或确定与 控件相关联的值。Use the property to specify or determine the value associated with the control. 该值可以是要与该控件关联的任何有效字符串。The value can be any valid string that you want to associate with the control. 当你有多个单选按钮并且需要根据所选内容执行计算时，这非常有用。This is useful when you have multiple radio buttons and need to perform a calculation based on the selection. 例如，您可以具有表示不同发运方法的单选按钮。For example, you can have radio buttons that represent different shipping methods. 可以在 属性中存储发货成本。You can store the shipping cost in the property. 当用户选择运费方法时，可以通过此属性确定相应的装运量，并将其添加到销售总额。When the user selects the shipping method, the appropriate shipping amount can be determined from this property and added to the sales total. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性将说明与 控件相关联。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to associate a description with the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputRadioButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButton/CS/htmlinputradiobuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputRadioButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputRadioButton/VB/htmlinputradiobuttonvb.aspx#1)]
